DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective project demonstrate new approach cardiac stress image combine treadmill exercise cardiac magnetic resonance ( CMR ) provide valuable clinical information cost-effective manner .
DOC.criteria: patient refer stress SPECT known suspect ischemic heart disease ability perform adequate treadmill stress contraindication MRI ( e.g . ferromagnetic foreign body , cerebral aneurysm clip , pacemaker/ICD , severe claustrophobia ) renal insufficiency ( GFR < 40 ) know allergy gadoliniumbased contrast iodinate contrast ( research CTA patient refer cath 2 week )
